title: S2. Ep4. Talking with Jason Folino about being an effective leader in the construction industry
excerpt: In this week's podcast, we talk with Jason Folino – joint Victorian State Manager at Buildcorp Interiors, a leading Fit-out and Refurbishment contracts across the East Coast of Australia.
author: Building Environs

sections.heading: S2. Ep4. Talking with Jason Folino about being an effective leader in the construction industry

sections.content: In this week's podcast, we talk with +[Jason Folino](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jason-folino-03532648/)+ – joint Victorian State Manager at +[Buildcorp Interiors](https://buildcorp.com.au/)+, a leading Fit-out and Refurbishment contracts across the East Coast of Australia.

We cover his experiences as a business leader through the Covid lockdowns in Melbourne whilst covering culture, leadership, and teams – including some of the projects that Buildcorp have delivered such as their 2021 Master Builders Victoria 'Excellence in Construction' Award (the companies 100th MBA project Award) for their delivery of the MinterEllison fitout.

We also covered the challenges around procurement, resources, and staffing in the current market and looking forward through what looks to be a bit of a post-Covid boom stage in the construction industry.
Other things that we discuss in the podcast:

items: Dynamic of change so when it comes to the leadership elements
How good leadership plays a big part in successful project delivery
Putting teams together that suit clients and projects
Biggest challenges for contractors in the next couple of months

sections.content: If you have an interest in the Melbourne building industry, building and developing a company within the industry, or have an interest in what takes place within a business of this size, then have a listen.

sections.title: S2. Ep4. Talking with Jason Folino about being an effective leader in the construction industry
sections.subtitle: The Building Talks Podcast
